ust to let you all know, you need the Real Tone Cable which is only included in the original game. No matter if you crack it you wont be able to play it without the cable.

As far as i know it takes a realtone cable or at least something that shows up in windows with the same ID as the realtone (some people are working on that). From what i have read in the comments a lot of people posting here have the cable already from a console version.
